question: Can foreigners start businesses in the United States?
answer: Can a non-resident foreign national start a company in the United States? The answer is "YES". Every day, foreign nationals use our solutions to establish US companies ranging from large corporations to small businesses.

question: How can I start a business in the United States?
answer:
To create your US LLC and begin conducting business in the United States, you must first:

  • Choose a state.
  • Give your company a name.
  • Engage the services of a registered agent.
  • Form your LLC.
  • Make an operating agreement for your LLC.
  • Obtain an EIN.
  • Obtain a physical postal address in the United States.
  • Create a bank account there.

question: How much does it cost to register a business in the United States?
answer: The cost of registering a company in the United States varies depending on the type of business structure you select for the company and additional expenses that vary from state to state.
